title: Object - Document

path.description: Relative path/filename for the document. Path is understood to be a relative location within an associated ZIP archive (packaged separately from the OCF archive) e.g. './acceptance_records/John_Wayne_2017_Grant_Agreement.pdf'

related_objects.title: Document - Related Objects Array
related_objects.description: List of objects which this document is related to

uri.description: Uniform resource identifier for the document if not using the `path` property and associated ZIP archive separate from the OCF package.
